description: Coefficient triangle of polynomials (falling powers) related to Fibonacci convolutions. Companion triangle to A057281.
comments: The row polynomials are q(k,x) := sum(a(k,m)*x^(k-m),m=0..k), k=0,1,2,..The k-th convolution of F0(n) := A000045(n+1), n >= 0, (Fibonacci numbers starting with F0(0)=1) with itself is Fk(n) := A037027(n+k,k) = (p(k-1,n)*(n+1)*F0(n+1) + q(k-1,n)*(n+2)*F0(n))/(k!*5^k), k=1,2,..., where the companion polynomials p(k,n) := sum(b(k,m)*n^(k-m),m=0..k) are the row polynomials of triangle b(k,m)= A057281(k,m).a(k,0)= A020876(k), k >= 0.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 13 2000
